fields.name: NOTICE_DATE
fields.doc: date and time of notice creation

fields.name: TRIGGER_NUM
fields.doc: string of alpha and digits uniquely identifying event

fields.name: SEG_NUM
fields.doc: Swift serial number (for Swift notice types only)

fields.name: LIVE_TIME
fields.doc: exposure time duration of the spectrum integration [sec]

fields.name: SRC_RA
fields.doc: ra of the XRT bore sight in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: SRC_DEC
fields.doc: dec of the XRT bore sight in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: MODE
fields.doc: CCD Readout mode.  The values are: 1-Null 2-Short image 3-Long image 4-Piled-up Photodiode 5-Low Rate Photodiode 6-Windowed Timing 7-Photo-counting 8-Raw data 9-Bias map 10-Stop

fields.name: WAVEFORM
fields.doc: CCD waveform ID. The values are either 50 or 60

fields.name: LRPD_BIAS
fields.doc: the bias value of the last LRPD frame (ignore this for WT spectrum).  The units are ADU

fields.name: TERM_COND
fields.doc: termination condition of the lightcurve collection process.  The values are: 0-Normal, 1-Terminated by time, 2-Terminated by snapshot, 3-Terminated by entering SAA, 4-Spectrum generated at the LRPD-to-WT transition, 5-Spectrum generated at the WT-to-LRorPC transition

fields.name: SPEC_URL
fields.doc: full URL of Swift XRT Spectrum

fields.name: MISC_19
fields.doc: 32 Flag Bits. See https://gcn.gsfc.nasa.gov/sock_pkt_def_doc.html for definition of bits, some bits may not be defined
